name: Aliens & Asteroids
description:
Stay alive and fight the numerous Aliens, which try to kill you. Aliens&Asteroids is my first solo project, inspired by the arcade game Asteroids and Risk of Rain. Each stage is a fight for survival. Defeat the Boss of the Stage and advance to the next one. Powerful useables and ship upgrades help you on your journey.

  • Challenging Bosses
  • Increasing Difficulty
  • Controller Support
  • Powerful Artefacts and Abilities
  • Unlockable Upgrades

WARNING: The game still contains minor bugs and development is still ongoing.
